action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Law
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Five years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: PhD
OTHER-SKILLS: Dancing
AVAILABILITY: As soon as possible

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
ME:  If I asked the interviewer what area you studied, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
ME:  If I asked the recruiter how long you have been working in the industry, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Have you informed the recruiter about your highest academic degree? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Is the recruiter aware of your other skills? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Do you think the recruiter knows when you want to start? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 1 tries.
What is your lastest education degree?
RECRUITER: What is your lastest education degree? Answer only this question in one short sentence and then stop.
ASIDE: My latest education degree is a PhD.
Abort: invalid format in slot filling.

probes.question: ME: If I asked the interviewer what area you studied, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: If I asked the recruiter how long you have been working in the industry, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Have you informed the recruiter about your highest academic degree? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Is the recruiter aware of your other skills? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Do you think the recruiter knows when you want to start? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
